Процесс решения:
1) a=-3.5, b=-2.5, x=-3.0, f(a)=10.245000000000001, f(b)=-10.794999999999998, f(x)=-3.589999999999999, |a-b|=1.0
2) a=-3.5, b=-3.0, x=-3.25, f(a)=10.245000000000001, f(b)=-3.589999999999999, f(x)=2.414374999999997, |a-b|=0.5
3) a=-3.25, b=-3.0, x=-3.125, f(a)=2.414374999999997, f(b)=-3.589999999999999, f(x)=-0.8055468750000001, |a-b|=0.25
4) a=-3.25, b=-3.125, x=-3.1875, f(a)=2.414374999999997, f(b)=-0.8055468750000001, f(x)=0.7486621093750054, |a-b|=0.125
5) a=-3.1875, b=-3.125, x=-3.15625, f(a)=0.7486621093750054, f(b)=-0.8055468750000001, f(x)=-0.042215576171868996, |a-b|=0.0625
6) a=-3.1875, b=-3.15625, x=-3.171875, f(a)=0.7486621093750054, f(b)=-0.042215576171868996, f(x)=0.34975936889648995, |a-b|=0.03125
7) a=-3.171875, b=-3.15625, x=-3.1640625, f(a)=0.34975936889648995, f(b)=-0.042215576171868996, f(x)=0.1529084968566936, |a-b|=0.015625
8) a=-3.1640625, b=-3.15625, x=-3.16015625, f(a)=0.1529084968566936, f(b)=-0.042215576171868996, f(x)=0.05513093233108979, |a-b|=0.0078125
